name: Branding Expenses Tracker
description: Ideal for those who are looking to manage their business branding expenses, this tracker helps you keep track of branding expenses such as design, events, marketing expenses and much more.Are you looking for a tracker to keep track of expenses associated with your business operations and manage your finances effectively?This tracker is perfect to set expense limits, plan business operation strategies in advance, and make wise financial decisions for each business operation expenses within the pr
features: Google Doc Template: A template file with placeholders in {{...}} format (e.g.,{{InvoiceNumber}},{{ClientName}}).; Notion Database: Acts as a database with matching headers likeClientName,InvoiceDatefor seamless placeholder mapping.; Install the extension and setup the automation.; One-time setup and configuration; Quick 5-minute installation process; Copy Notion Database properties placeholders; Paste them into your Google Document template; One-time setup per document template; Set your preferred automation schedule; Automatically scans Notion database
